ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates the performance of SciChart with many series by loading 500 series each with 500 points.
ExampleDefinition.Description:
This demo showcases the loading or startup time of SciChart with many series by appending 500 series to a chart, each with 500 points and rendering instantly!
Also shows a novel way to dynamically create RenderableSeries by binding to DataSeries using an attached property LineSeriesSource
[b][i]Example Usage[/i][/b] Click 'Create Data' to create hundreds of series instantly!
Then Zoom and Pan the chart to see the smoothness.
